title: Question about Account Deletion
body:
Hi. I was curious if it is possible to have an account deleted?

Would that also remove all posts and links to 3rd party engines?

replies.body: We don't support third parties, you would have to reach out to them directly.  :/  We can look into your other requests, though.  Reach out to our account team through a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and we'll see what we can do for you.

Thank you.

Cheer up! It's all good.

I still love you guys.
